meanings.definition: The act of affixing or attaching something
meanings.sent1: Her affixations of stickers to her notebook made it colorful.
meanings.sent2: The affixations of stamps to the envelope ensured its delivery.
meanings.sent3: The affixations of magnets to the fridge created a magnetic masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His affixations of memories to his heart made it a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The affixations of stars to the sky painted a celestial canvas.

meanings.definition: The result of affixing or attaching something
meanings.sent1: The affixations on the wall showed her artistic side.
meanings.sent2: The affixations on the document indicated its authenticity.
meanings.sent3: The affixations on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The affixations on the tree branches resembled nature's ornaments.
meanings.sent5: The affixations on the map highlighted important locations.
